body_html: The error message looks perfectly fine and clear to me. It says that it expects a 4d input, and tells you that your input is only 3d. Also, how could it possibly know if you are missing channel dimension or just set the thing wrong? It will be more ambiguous if the input is [1, 32, 32], so you can't even guess if channel or batch dimension is missing. It is far far from "incredibly unhelpful".

body: The error message looks perfectly fine and clear to me. It says that it expects a 4d input, and tells you that your input is only 3d. Also, how could it possibly know if you are missing channel dimension or just set the thing wrong? It will be more ambiguous if the input is `[1, 32, 32]`, so you can't even guess if channel or batch dimension is missing. It is far far from "incredibly unhelpful".
